item.title: Should the Idea Person get Extra Equity?
item.description: As I mentioned in my last post, I have some ideas for a startup, and I’m excited to start working on them.ยน Unfortunately, doing a startup raises a lot of questions that I, as a former wannabe philosophy professor, haven’t really considered. Since its probably not a good idea to dive in to a venture that I don’t really understand, it seems like I should spend some time wrestling with what we might call “startup questions.
